hours.question: What are your office hours?
hours.answer: We're open Monday through Friday, 8:00 AM to 5:00 PM. We're closed on weekends and major holidays.

location.question: Where are you located?
location.answer: Our office is located at 123 Main Street, Suite 100, Dallas, TX 75201. We're in the medical plaza next to Central Hospital.

directions.question: How do I get to your office?
directions.answer: We're located at 123 Main Street in downtown Dallas. Parking is available in the building garage. Enter from Oak Street and take a parking ticket at the gate.

parking.question: Is parking available?
parking.answer: Yes, free parking is available in our building garage. Enter from Oak Street and bring your parking ticket to our office for validation.

insurance.question: What insurance do you accept?
insurance.answer: We accept most major insurance plans including Blue Cross Blue Shield, UnitedHealthcare, Aetna, and Cigna. Please call to verify your specific plan.

new_patient.question: Do you accept new patients?
new_patient.answer: Yes, we're currently accepting new patients. Please bring your insurance card and a photo ID to your first appointment. Arrive 15 minutes early to complete paperwork.

appointments.question: How do I schedule an appointment?
appointments.answer: You can schedule an appointment by calling us, or I can help you schedule one right now. What day and time works best for you?

cancellation.question: What's your cancellation policy?
cancellation.answer: Please provide at least 24 hours notice if you need to cancel or reschedule. You can call us or use our patient portal to manage your appointments.

telehealth.question: Do you offer telehealth?
telehealth.answer: Yes, we offer telehealth video visits for certain types of appointments. Please let us know if you'd prefer a virtual visit when scheduling.

prescriptions.question: How do I refill a prescription?
prescriptions.answer: For prescription refills, please contact your pharmacy and they'll send a request to our office. You can also request refills through our patient portal. Allow 48 hours for processing.

emergency.question: What if I have a medical emergency?
emergency.answer: If you're experiencing a medical emergency, please hang up and call 911 or go to the nearest emergency room immediately.

after_hours.question: What if I need help after hours?
after_hours.answer: For urgent medical issues after hours, please call our main number and follow the prompts to reach our on-call provider. For emergencies, call 911.

forms.question: Where can I get forms?
forms.answer: Patient forms are available on our website at www.example.com/forms. You can also access them through our patient portal or pick them up at the front desk.

records.question: How do I get my medical records?
records.answer: To request medical records, please complete a records release form available on our website or at our office. We'll process your request within 30 days as required by law.

payment.question: What payment methods do you accept?
payment.answer: We accept cash, checks, and all major credit cards. Payment is due at the time of service. We also offer payment plans for larger balances.

billing.question: I have a billing question
billing.answer: For billing questions, please contact our billing department at (555) 123-4567 or billing@example.com. They're available Monday through Friday, 9 AM to 4 PM.
